title: Crafting Table
desc:
Post 786
- When stood on, when drawing any card, you can draw a second one and combine the two.
- You are not allowed to see the cards before you combine them.
- When stood on, you can spend an Iron points to draw a random <:weapon:1107519313075785768> card.
- When stood on, you can spend a Netherite point apply a tier one **Enhance** to a <:weapon:1107519313075785768> card.
- When stood on, you can spend one Flint and one Iron point to draw 920.
- This card is of the Wood subtype.
- This card takes 3 hit to break with a tool that is not meant for it.
